exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aersi : append_entries_reply_sublog_interface si : sorted_interface net : network h : name st' : name -> data ps' : list packet out : list raft_output d : raft_data l : list (name * msg) H : handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) H0 : forall (h : Net.name) (h' : name), type (nwState net h) = Leader -> Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (nwState net h) h') <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) H1 : raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h' H3 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h l) h0 : Net.name h' : name H4 : type (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} h0) = Leader Unable to unify "handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l)" with "Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} h0) h') <= maxIndex (log (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} h0))".

original: intros. unfold raft_net_invariant_timeout. intros. unfold nextIndex_safety in *. intros. apply H; auto.
